txt.en: 'Elladan and Elrohir must be warned of your discovery; however, they are well-guarded at Thorenhad. I am more immediately concerned with Narlinn and Fimgris, who are encamped on the road, without any defence against such creatures.\n\n'Return to Narlinn with due haste and tell her of your discovery. She will decide whether to return herself to Thorenhad or send you in her stead. To reach her encampment, return to the main road and head west.'
You discovered that the trolls encamped in the nearby cave are not Stone-trolls, but Cave-trolls...a much greater threat.
'I am relieved that Arrod is well and that Caledhroval has been recovered, but the tidings you bring are dire. Cave-trolls? In the Bruinen Gorges?\n\n'I shall have to consider our best course....'
Narlinn is at her encampment, west along the main road from Arrod's camp.\n\nArrod bade you take word of your discovery within the troll-cave to Narlinn.
